author: Fixator10
Stevy
install_msg:
**Port of Leveler by AznStevy to V3.**
⚠ Warning: this cog is not tested fully and may be unstable, including existing database corruption.
⚠ Warning: If you have pymongo installed, but you're not running a Mongodb server instance, having this cog loaded will crash your bot.
`___________________________`
It is advised that you are familiar with the process to install and maintain the requirements needed for Stevy's v2 leveler: this cog has the same requirements of having a running Mongodb server instance and pillow and pymongo need to be installed, and if you have an existing Mongo database you've used with the v2 version of the cog, it will work with this version out of the box. Optionally, scipy is required for auto-color generation commands for profile, rank, and levelup images.
`___________________________`
For more information about installing, please refer to this: http://dimxxz.net/lvlsupport.html and this: https://github.com/AznStevy/Maybe-Useful-Cogs
You can also use `[p]lvladmin convertv2 /path/to/V2-Red-DiscordBot` to get data about existing servers settings and backgrounds.
This fork is maintained by aikaterna#1393 and is slightly different than Fixator10's published version.
description:
Level/Experience tracker
Increase activity(or not) on your server with chat exp!
